page.title: 13AN AFTERNOON IN THE LIFE OF.
page.content: I WENT HOME AND FOR MY LUNCH. I HAD A ROLL ON GAMMON AND A GLASS OF COLA AND THEN LEFT TO GO BACK TO SCHOOL AT 12.35PM. ONCE I HAD LEFT THE HOUSE I MET LORNA AND WHEN WE ARRIVED AT THE SCHOOL WE WENT TO MRS. STEIN'S OFFICE TO GET TICKETS FOR THE MAY FAIR.THIS WAS AN ACTIVITY TO TRY TO RAISE MONEY FOR SCHOOL FUNDS. WE DID SOME OF OUR {DOOMSDAY PROJECT UNTIL 2.00PM. SOME OF US WENT TO RECORDER AND THE OTHERS DID S.R.A AND MATHS.SCHOOL FINISHED AT 3.00 A.M. I WASHED MY HAIR WHEN I GOT HOME BECAUSE I WAS GOING TO THE DISCO. I CAME HOME AT 10.10PM AND WATCHED THE END OF A FILM CALLED "JAWS 3" WHICH IS ABOUT A SHARK WHICH ATTACKS PEOPLE.FOLLOWING THIS I WENT TO MY BED AT 10.35PM.
